original_text: It stood between the Egyptian army and the Israelite army. During the whole night, the Egyptians were in the dark, because of the cloud. But the cloud gave light to the Israelites. So the two armies did not come near to each other during the whole night.
korean_text: 애굽 진과 이스라엘 진 사이에 이르러 서니 저쪽에는 구름과 흑암이 있고 이쪽에는 밤이 밝으므로 밤새도록 저쪽이 이쪽에 가까이 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: It stood between the Egyptian army
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 이집트 군대 사이에 서 있었다

sentences.original_text: the Egyptians were in the dark
So the two armies did not come near
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 두 군대는 가까이 가지 않았다

sentences.original_text: to each other during the whole night
